name: Super Tower Defence World
description:
Defend your kingdom from invading players! They have seen your flag and they are coming for it.

Plan your defence and wait for the incoming horde. Can you best the thieving band of players?


A mashup of classic platformers and tower defence-like games, Super Tower Defence World flips the table and puts the player (you) in charge of the kingdom's defence.

Control the camera with your arrow keys, and use your mouse to place "creep spawners". But be warned - your finances are limited! Place your defences wisely!


Art by Kenney (kenney.nl)! Music: Adrian Holovaty - ReMix: Super Mario Bros. 2 'Gypsy Jazz' OC ReMix - http://ocremix.org/remix/OCR01466

Originally made for MiniLD63.
